amazing pages

You can check all our pages directly from the menu, but we handpicked the most relevant ones for you.

FOR TEAMS

Create awesome websites for your team, full customizable theme that gives you unlimited possibilities!

create communities

Pandemic gives you the power to be able to create communities powered by bbPress forums.

news and blogs

If you aren’t interested in the community side, Pandemic also allows you to create awesome pages focused on news and blogs.

GAME STUDIOS​

Got a game or a project and a need a website? Create your portfolio today with Pandemic, easy peasy!

fantastic features

One Click Install Demo

Get a headstart with our one click install demo importer.

Create Pages with Elementor

Easily create amazing pages with Elementor, the best Page Builder for WordPress.

Custom Team Pages

Promote and showcase what's going on in your team in their beautifully designed profile!

Custom User Pages

Better looking than ever, users have custom designed pages, no more WordPress default!

Fully Customizable

From fonts to background images, Pandemic gives you the power to create a completely unique looking website.

Create Matches

With Pandemic you can create matches between teams, recording your scores and much more!

Optimized for SEO

With the new Pandemic rework ranking in Google has never been easier

Translation Ready

Pandemic is not only compatible with the WPML plugin for creating multilingual websites and ready for RTL languages, but also comes prepared for easy translation into any language.

RTL Supported

Your website is on a RTL language? No problem, we got you covered.

Woocommerce Ready

Got Merch to sell? Easily set up shops with Pandemic Woocommerce plugin.
